# Starwizz

Starwizz is a high-performance web-based starfield and galaxy generator built with Angular and Canvas API. It allows users to generate cinematic 4K cosmic visuals with customizable simulation parameters.

## Core Features
- Realistic starfield generation with depth and movement.
- Integrated Galaxy background rendering.
- Real-time controls for zoom, rotation, and star speed.
- Shooting star simulation with object pooling for performance.
- In-browser 4K video recording and download.
- Responsive HUD for simulation control.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Angular (Standalone Components, Signals)
- **Rendering**: HTML5 Canvas API (2D Context)
- **State Management**: Angular Signals
- **Recording**: MediaRecorder API
- **Styling**: TailwindCSS

## Key Files
- `src/app/services/simulation.service.ts`: Central state and simulation logic.
- `src/app/components/simulator/simulator.ts`: Main canvas rendering component.
- `src/app/models/star.model.ts`: Logic for individual star physics and drawing.
- `src/app/constants/simulation.test.ts`: Configuration and constants.

## URL
- Repo: https://github.com/sidthesloth92/starwizz
- Live: https://sidthesloth92.github.io/starwizz/
